attributes.action: allow all asylum seekers to work, and to allow those in UK for more than four years to remain indefinitely.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present asylum-seekers are not allowed to work, even though they often cannot be returned to their home country. This fuels prejudice against them, and damages their recovery from trauma and integration into society. 
Those who have been here four years without causing problems, and who Immigration have failed to remove, should not be kept in limbo any longer!
